Name: Jump! Fork!
About the game: Game Play The player mainly acts as a tableware, perhaps a fork, by crossing obstacles to reach the food, and then completing the game. Drag the mouse to control the direction and strength of the fork's bounce, The player needs multiple attempts in some places to overcome obstacles.The goal is to reach the plate. But be careful not to let the fork fall to the ground. One day I suddenly wondered if I could make the usual process of searching for food into a game. It's like we always think about what to eat at noon and what to eat at night. Turn this process into an experience. At home, or on vacation. Experience every wonderful experience of foraging, sometimes simple, sometimes difficult. Enjoy the process. Maybe you will have a new understanding of eating later. This is pretty good.
